metadata.title: CVE-2017-9216 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: libjbig2dec.a in Artifex jbig2dec 0.13, as used in MuPDF and Ghostscript, has a NULL pointer dereference in the jbig2_huffman_get function in jbig2_huffman.c. For example, the jbig2dec utility will crash (segmentation fault) when parsing an invalid file.

criterions.comment: jbig2dec package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
